titles.title: A bill to amend the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930 to require commission merchants, dealers, and brokers to label perishable agricultural commodities with the name of the country of origin of such commodities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From USDA.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 2/25/1987--Introduced. Amends the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930 to require commission merchants, dealers, and brokers to label imported perishable commodities with the name of the country of origin.
